Class FlippedTileDeck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.model.tiles.decks.FlippedTileDeck
public class FlippedTileDeck extends Object
This class represent the tiles that were seen by a player but not used on their ship. All this tiles are placed face up on the table in the real life game.

    • addTile

      public void addTile(@NotNull @NotNull Tile tile)
      Whenever a player draws a card from the TileDeck and not uses it, that tile will be inserted here.
      Parameters:
      tile - Represent the tile to add into the Deck.

    • getTileObject

      public Tile getTileObject(@NotNull @NotNull Tile tile)
      This method is used to get a specific tile from the deck, since you already know witch tile you want it only gets eliminated from the deck.
      Parameters:
      tile - Represent the tile I want to get
      Returns:
      Returns the tile that I selected

      public Tile getTilePosition(int index)
